newsitem.title: USA: Chateau Properties continues share buyback.
newsitem.headline: Chateau Properties continues share buyback.

text.p: Chateau Properties Inc said it intends to begin the repurchase of up to 750,000 shares of its common stock.

These purchases are part of a previously announced plan and are in addition to 450,000 shares already purchased. The shares will be repurchased in the open market or in privately negotiated purchases, Chateau said in a statement on Tuesday.
Chateau had about 6.1 million sharess outstanding at September 30, 1996.

Chateau had said it would launch this repurchase program as part of its proposed merger agreement with ROC Communities Inc . Shareholders of ROC Communities approved the proposed merger on Tuesday. Chateau said it is committed to completing the combination of Chateau and ROC and completing the repurchase program.
Chateau is a real estate investment trust which owns, manages, develops and acquires manufactured housing communities.
